remarks: Orthomodular law equivalent.  Theorem 2(ii) of [Kalmbach] p. 22. ( ~ pjoml analog.)  (Contributed by NM, 19-Oct-2011.)
statement:
omllaw3.b $e |- B = ( Base ` K ) $.
omllaw3.l $e |- .<_ = ( le ` K ) $.
omllaw3.m $e |- ./\ = ( meet ` K ) $.
omllaw3.o $e |- ._|_ = ( oc ` K ) $.
omllaw3.z $e |- .0. = ( 0. ` K ) $.
omllaw3 $p |- ( ( K e. OML /\ X e. B /\ Y e. B ) -> ( ( X .<_ Y /\ ( Y ./\ ( ._|_ ` X ) ) = .0. ) -> X = Y ) ) $.
